item.title: The Retreat of the State?
item.description: Gilpin, Robert. “The Retreat of the State?.” In Strange Power: Shaping the Parameters of International Relations and International Political Economy, edited by Thomas Lawton, James Rosenau, Amy C. Verdun, 197-214. London: Routledge, 2000. Keywords: Theory; State; Markets; Authority Text access (external link)
